accountingControl.title: Habilitar controle contábil detalhado
accountingControl.description: Permite adicionar subcategorias ao lançar contas a pagar e receber, especificando a categoria contábil de cada pagamento para melhor controle financeiro

taxSimulation.title: Simulação de impostos no DRE
taxSimulation.description: Habilita simulações de impostos para planejamento tributário. Permite calcular quanto seria pago em impostos sem gerar lançamentos reais, apenas projeções no DRE

monitorChairTime.title: Monitor chair time
monitorChairTime.description: Tracks waiting room time and actual appointment duration in detail

identifyConflicts.title: Identify schedule conflicts
identifyConflicts.description: System displays automatic alerts when detecting overlapping appointments

identifyNoShowsAndCancellations.title: Identify who canceled or missed
identifyNoShowsAndCancellations.description: Maintains detailed history of cancellations and no-shows for better patient management

financialParameters.title: Financial Parameters
financialParameters.subtitle: Configure advanced financial and accounting control features

accountingControl.title: Enable detailed accounting control
accountingControl.description: Allows adding subcategories when posting accounts payable and receivable, specifying the accounting category of each payment for better financial control

taxSimulation.title: Tax simulation in Income Statement
taxSimulation.description: Enables tax simulations for tax planning. Allows calculating how much would be paid in taxes without generating actual entries, only projections in the Income Statement

identifyConflicts.title: Identificar conflictos de horarios
identifyConflicts.description: El sistema muestra alertas automáticas al detectar superposición de citas

identifyNoShowsAndCancellations.title: Identificar quién canceló o faltó
identifyNoShowsAndCancellations.description: Mantiene historial detallado de cancelaciones y ausencias para mejor gestión de pacientes

financialParameters.title: Parámetros Financieros
financialParameters.subtitle: Configure funciones avanzadas de control financiero y contable

accountingControl.title: Habilitar control contable detallado
accountingControl.description: Permite agregar subcategorías al registrar cuentas por pagar y cobrar, especificando la categoría contable de cada pago para mejor control financiero
